name: page-7c280dea
page_data_script:
user = frappe.session.user

products = frappe.call('awesome_commerce.api.item.get_products')
categories = frappe.call('awesome_commerce.api.item_group.get_categories')


brands = frappe.get_all(
    "Brand",
    filters={"custom_publish_to_website": 1}, 
    fields=["name", "image", "brand", "description"], 
    ignore_permissions=True
)

banner_slider_doc = frappe.get_all(
    "Website Slideshow", 
    filters={"custom_show_in": "Home Banner"},
    fields=['name'],
    ignore_permissions=True
)

banner_sliders = frappe.get_all(
    "Website Slideshow Item",
    fields=["heading", "description", "image", "url"], 
    filters={
        "parent": banner_slider_doc[0] if banner_slider_doc else None
    },
    order_by="idx",
    ignore_permissions=True
)

data.user = user
data.categories = categories
data.products = products
data.grab_deal_products = products[:10]
data.categories = categories
data.banner_sliders = banner_sliders
data.brands = brands

data.page_data = {
    "products": products
}

name: page-dd455797
page_data_script:
all_categories = frappe.call('awesome_commerce.api.item_group.get_categories')
category_route = frappe.form_dict.get('category_route')
category = frappe.call('awesome_commerce.api.item_group.search_category', categories=all_categories, category_route=category_route) 
page = frappe.form_dict.get('page', 1) 
limit = frappe.form_dict.get('limit', 12)
sort_by = frappe.form_dict.get('sort_by', 'Default')
products_data = frappe.call('awesome_commerce.api.item_group.get_products', category_name=category.get("name") if category else None, page=page, limit=limit, sort_by=sort_by)
user = frappe.session.user
products = frappe.call('awesome_commerce.api.item.get_products')

total_products  = products_data["total_products"]
start_product = (products_data["page"] - 1) * products_data["limit"] + 1
end_product = min(products_data["page"] * products_data["limit"], products_data["total_products"])
pagination_text = f"Showing {start_product}-{end_product} of {total_products} Products"

sort_by = [
    {
        'name': 'Default'        
    },
    {
        'name': 'Price Low To High'
    },
    {
        'name': 'Price High To Low'
    },
    {
        'name': 'Alphabetical (A to Z)'
    },
    {
        'name': 'Alphabetical (Z to A)'
    }
]


data.category = category
data.all_categories = all_categories 
data.categories = all_categories 
data.subcategories = category.subcategories
data.products_data = products_data
data.pagination_text =pagination_text
data.user = user
data.sort_by = sort_by

data.page_data = {
    "products": products,
    "page": page,
    "total_products": total_products,
    "limit": limit
}

name: page-66f29eb3
page_data_script:
user = frappe.session.user

products = frappe.call('awesome_commerce.api.item.get_products')
categories = frappe.call('awesome_commerce.api.item_group.get_categories')

user_data = frappe.get_cached_doc("User", user)

billing_addresses = frappe.get_list("Address", fields=["*"], filters={"owner": frappe.session.user, "address_type": 'Billing', "disabled":0})
shipping_addresses = frappe.get_list("Address", fields=["*"], filters={"owner": frappe.session.user, "address_type": 'Shipping', "disabled":0})


csrf_token =frappe.session.csrf_token
countries = frappe.get_all('Country')
orders = frappe.get_all(
    "Sales Order",
    filters={"owner": user},
    fields=["name", "transaction_date", "grand_total", "status"]
)

for order in orders:
    order["order_items"] = frappe.get_all(
        "Sales Order Item",
        filters={"parent": order["name"]},
        fields=["item_code", "item_name", "qty", "rate", "amount", "image"]
    )
    order["taxes"] = frappe.get_all(
        "Sales Taxes and Charges",
        filters={"parent": order["name"]},
        fields=["charge_type", "account_head", "rate", "tax_amount", "description"]
    )


address_type_options = [{'name':'Billing'}, {'name': "Shipping"}]

default_currency = frappe.db.get_default("currency")

for order in orders:
    order["grand_total"] = frappe.utils.fmt_money(order["grand_total"], currency=default_currency)
    order['details_link'] = '/printview?doctype=Sales%20Order&name=' + order['name']
    
    for item in order['order_items']:
        item["rate"] = frappe.utils.fmt_money(item["rate"], currency=default_currency)
        item["amount"] = frappe.utils.fmt_money(item["amount"], currency=default_currency)
    for tax in order['taxes']:
        tax["tax_amount"] = frappe.utils.fmt_money(tax["tax_amount"], currency=default_currency)
        

data.user = user
data.categories = categories
data.orders = orders
data.user_data = user_data
data.billing_addresses = billing_addresses
data.shipping_addresses = shipping_addresses
data.countries = countries
data.address_type_options = address_type_options
data.page_data ={
    'csrf_token': csrf_token,
    "products": products
}

name: page-91f3c6da
page_data_script:
# Get the current session user
user = frappe.session.user

products = frappe.call('awesome_commerce.api.item.get_products')
categories = frappe.call('awesome_commerce.api.item_group.get_categories')

# Initialize default variables for logged-in status and user data
user_logged_in = False
user_data = None
shipping_address = None
billing_address = None

# Check if the user is logged in (not a guest)
if user != "Guest":
    user_logged_in = True
    # Get user details from cached document
    user_data = frappe.get_cached_doc("User", user)
    
    billing_addresses = frappe.get_list("Address", fields=["*"], filters={"owner": frappe.session.user, "address_type": 'Billing', "disabled":0})
    shipping_addresses = frappe.get_list("Address", fields=["*"], filters={"owner": frappe.session.user, "address_type": 'Shipping', "disabled":0})
    
else: 
    billing_addresses = []
    shipping_addresses = []
    
countries = frappe.get_all('Country')

data.page_data = {
    "products": products
}
data.user = user
data.user_logged_in = user_logged_in
data.user_data = user_data
data.shipping_addresses = shipping_addresses
data.billing_addresses = billing_addresses
data.countries = countries
data.categories = categories

page_data_script:
user = frappe.session.user

products = frappe.call('awesome_commerce.api.item.get_products')
categories = frappe.call('awesome_commerce.api.item_group.get_categories')

data.user = user
data.categories = categories
countries = frappe.get_all('Country')
csrf_token =frappe.session.csrf_token

data.countries = countries
data.page_data = {
    "products": products,
    "csrf_token": csrf_token,
    "user": user
}

}

page_data_script:
user = frappe.session.user

products = frappe.call('awesome_commerce.api.item.get_products')
categories = frappe.call('awesome_commerce.api.item_group.get_categories')

data.user = user
data.categories = categories

data.page_data = {
    "products": products
}

user = frappe.session.user

products = frappe.call('awesome_commerce.api.item.get_products')
categories = frappe.call('awesome_commerce.api.item_group.get_categories')

data.categories = categories

    "products": products
}

page_data_script:
user = frappe.session.user

products = frappe.call('inventocom.api.item.get_products')
categories = frappe.call('inventocom.api.item_group.get_categories')

data.user = user
data.categories = categories

data.page_data = {
    "products": products
}

page_data_script:
user = frappe.session.user

products = frappe.call('inventocom.api.item.get_products')
categories = frappe.call('inventocom.api.item_group.get_categories')

data.user = user
data.categories = categories

data.page_data = {
    "products": products
}

user = frappe.session.user

products = frappe.call('inventocom.api.item.get_products')
categories = frappe.call('inventocom.api.item_group.get_categories')

data.categories = categories

}

name: page-8d75034b
page_data_script:
user = frappe.session.user
categories = frappe.call('inventocom.api.item_group.get_categories')
products = frappe.call('inventocom.api.item.get_products')
category_route = frappe.form_dict.get('category_route')
item_route = frappe.form_dict.get('item_route')
product = frappe.call('inventocom.api.item.get_product')
category = frappe.call('inventocom.api.item_group.search_category', categories=categories, category_route=category_route) 
similar_products = frappe.call('inventocom.api.item.get_similar_products', category=category)

data.title = product.item_name
data.category = category
data.product = product
data.user = user
data.categories = categories
data.category = category
data.similar_products = similar_products
data.page_data = {
    "products" : products,
    
}
data.metatags = {
    'title': product.item_name,
    'image': product.image,
    'description': product.description
}

name: page-bd72e6c4
page_data_script:
user = frappe.session.user

products = frappe.call('inventocom.api.item.get_products')
categories = frappe.call('inventocom.api.item_group.get_categories')

data.user = user
data.categories = categories
csrf_token =frappe.session.csrf_token

data.page_data = {
    "products": products,
    "csrf_token": csrf_token
}
